text:
[Verse]
Drops fall from the sky
Dance with me don't be shy
Let's spin round and round
Lift off from the ground

[Verse 2]
Splash in every puddle
Forget life's little muddle
Feel the rhythm in your feet
The music in the street

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
Lost in joy no pain
Let the storm be our song
Together we belong

[Verse 3]
Moonlight breaks the night
On this endless flight
Hands and hearts in sync
In the rain we think

[Bridge]
Laughing through the pouring
Our spirits soaring
Every moment new
Dancing just us two

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
Lost in joy no pain
Let the storm be our song
Together we belong
title: Dancing in the Rain
